meanings.definition: A genus of mosquitoes known to transmit malaria.
meanings.sent1: Anopheles can spread malaria to humans.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study anopheles mosquitoes to understand how they transmit diseases.
meanings.sent3: The anopheles at the picnic seemed more interested in humans than in food.
meanings.sent4: The buzzing of anopheles in the night was a reminder of the dangers of malaria.
meanings.sent5: The anopheles, with its tiny body and long legs, is a carrier of disease.
